name: Blaze Accelerator Deployment (Skill Card)
text:
Axel / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
Once per turn, you can change the name of 1 "Blaze Accelerator" you control to "Tri-Blaze Accelerator". 
This Skill can be used twice per Duel.
